name: Celestia - Guarded by the Mist
description:
Go on an adventure and find out what lies beyond known borders.  You are part of the destiny of an entire continent, and your decisions affect the future of entire nations.  Therefore, don't give away your trust and faith foolishly.

 And whatever you do, do not get lost in the mist...

Story

You find yourself washed up on a beach with no memory of your past. A ship that has run aground on the rocks nearby leads to the assumption that you are a survivor of a shipwreck that left its harbour over 10 years ago.

Your only clue to what might have happened is a golden compass engraved with the crest of a lost king.

Game Highlights

  • Choose your own character portrait
  • Multiple endings
  • Playable in two different languages (german and english)
  • Athmospheric music and sounds
  • Stunning background images in every passage

We recommend to download the game for better performance.

Please report any bugs or spelling mistakes on our discord server.

You can support  us on ko-fi.

Version 0.0.1.4 (13.12.2022)
